Date: Tuesday, 6/25/1973
Subject: Chris Speier learns new position
Chris Speier has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,

Date: Saturday, 7/6/1973
Subject: Pat H. Kelly injured
Hello Manager,
looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Strained Hamstring Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 3 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor
